calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Fuel Poverty
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Consumer Focus, National Energy Action, and Energy Action Scotland; Age Concern and Help the Aged, and Macmillan Cancer Support (at 10.00am); eaga (at 10.45am)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Learning outside the classroom
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Council for Learning Outside the Classroom, Countryside Alliance, Field Studies Council, Royal Society for the Protection of Birds, and Sir Mike Tomlinson CBE; Association of School and College Leaders, Association of Teachers and Lecturers, National Association of Head Teachers, National Association of Schoolmasters Union of Women Teachers, and National Union of Teachers (at 11.00am)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Mark Dolley, Managing Director, Taking Part, and Tessa Sanderson CBE; Baroness Ford, Chairman, and Andrew Altman, Chief Executive, Olympic Park Legacy Company (at 11.30am)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Management of the Crown Estate
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Roger Bright CB, Chief Executive, The Crown Estate; Sarah McCarthy-Fry MP, Exchequer Secretary, HM Treasury (at 3.30pm)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Mobility Scooters
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Age Concern and Help the Aged, Disabled Persons Transport Advisory Committee, and Disability Essex; Norfolk Constabulary, Merseytravel, and Royal Society for the Prevention of Accidents (at 3.15pm); Living Streets, RAC Foundation, and Arriva (at 3.45pm); Rt Hon Sadiq Khan MP, Minister of State, Department for Transport (at 4.15pm)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Political developments in Northern Ireland
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Rt Hon Shaun Woodward MP, Secretary of State for Northern Ireland

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Treating Injury and Illness arising on Military Operations
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Sir Bill Jeffrey KCB, Permanent Under-Secretary, Lieutenant General Robert Baxter CBE, Deputy Chief of Defence Staff (Health), and Surgeon Vice Admiral Philip I Raffaelli, Surgeon General, Ministry of Defence
